actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Amendments of 1975.
short_title: National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Amendments

summary.text: National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Amendments - Authorizes appropriations in specified amounts for the National Endowment for the Arts and the National Endowment for the Humanities for the transition period ending September 30, 1976, and for fiscal years 1977, 1978, and 1979.

titles.title: National Foundation on the Arts and Humanities Amendments
A bill the National Foundation on the Arts and the Humanities Amendments of 1975.
